location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire to Narayn Wussadeojee

physicalDescription.extent: The letter book has been turned upside down and the correspondence relating to banking and financial matters has been entered from back to front, therefore the correspondence itself is upside down in relation to the folio numbers.

mods.abstract: Letter, marked private, regarding Pelly's recent bout of fever; his seventy-two shares in the new Bank of Bombay and arrangements to cover the cost of their purchase.The letter also discusses the sale of his shares in the old Bank of Bombay.
